      void damage​(int damagep, BattleState s, int reduce)
      Theoretically total reduction should be allowed but since we're making all energy resistance universal and all damage reduction impenetrable this is a measure to avoid monsters from becoming invincible.

      • click

        protected abstract boolean click​(Combatant current)
        Called not from the ArenaFight main logic but from the BattleScreen.perform(Runnable) callback (boils down to be being the same pretty much though).
        Parameters:
        current - Unit using this.
        Returns:
        Wheter to update Combatant.ap or not. false if nothing was actually done or if removing the unit from the Fight.
